details: In order to apply for the SRS Account through mail, you need to be an existing DBS/POSB savings/current/fixed deposit account holder.
Singaporeans & PR: Copy of NRIC (front & back). For Foreigners: Copy of Passport, Work Permit or Employment Pass (if any), and Declaration Form.
I agree to abide by the Bankâ€™s Terms and Conditions Governing SRS Account and Schedule of Charges.
Singapore dollar deposits under the Supplementary Retirement Scheme are insured by the Singapore Deposit Insurance Corporation, for up to S$50,000 in aggregate per depositor per Scheme member.
